message: Let's start fair. 50/50 seems like a good place to begin. What do you think?
I think I deserve a bit more, 55/45 is still a good deal for you.

You didn't budge, so I'll try again. 58/42 is my new offer. Time is running out, and inflation is eating away our money.

I see you're willing to move, but I still think I can get a bit more. 60/40 is my new offer. Inflation is really taking its toll, so think carefully.
